subject: Football
Ankles (Body Part)
Sprains and Strains
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: If the All-Pro defensive end Dwight Freeney, who has a severe ankle sprain, can’t go, Robert Mathis would probably move to his spot.
snippet: If the All-Pro defensive end Dwight Freeney, who has a severe ankle sprain, can’t go, Robert Mathis would probably move to his spot.
